newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle slow at $68 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle slow at $68 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was very slow in the Panhandle area early Monday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers not well tested. Feedlots reporting light inquiry.
Sales reported on 100 head slaughter heifers; 2,100 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 43 loads or 1,500 head of CME delivery cattle.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1000-1050 lbs 68.00.
